auth.remember_my_email_on_this_device: Remember my email on this device
auth.please_enter_the_6_digits_code_sent_to: Please enter the 6 digits code sent to
auth.use_accessible_phone_number: Be sure to use a phone number you have access to whenever you plan to sign in
auth.text_or_data_rates_may_apply: Text or data rates may apply.
auth.logging_you_in: One moment, we’re logging you in...
auth.account_creation_thanks: Thanks for creating an account. You’re almost done!
auth.account_creation_message: In a few minutes, you’ll receive an email with a confirmation link. Please confirm your email to complete your account set up.
auth.password_hint: Password must contain at least 8 characters and include at least one of each of the following: an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number and a special symbol (!, @, #, $, %, ^, & or *)
